name: df-cm
body: |- wceq(ccm, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wcel(cv(s1), cch)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), chj, cin(cv(s0), cfv(cort, cv(s1))))))))
comment: Define the commutes relation (on the Hilbert lattice). Definition of commutes in [Kalmbach] p. 20, who uses the notation xCy for "x commutes with y." See ~ cmbri for membership relation. (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
